title: LF Plat Substitutes that can Fill Any Roles.
body:
We're on a tournament that will start this 23-24th April
We just having enough 5 players in our team and still looking for someone can fill up just in case our member couldn't play.
Required: 
+ Plat Division (not diamond or gold, just plat) 
+ Could play ANY roles
+ Could play anytime in 23rd and 24th this April

If you are interested please contact me (Stormmmmmm) for more information, Thanks!
